languages.text: {n}Вы видите, как меняется выражение Абеляра — словно тень набежала на лицо сенешаля. Он с усталым видом поднимает руку и массирует висок.{/n} "Этого еще не хватало..."
{n}You see Abelard's expression change as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."
languages.original_text: {n}Вы видите, как меняется выражение Абеляра — словно тень набежала на лицо сенешаля. Он с усталым видом поднимает руку и массирует висок.{/n} "Этого еще не хватало..."

traits.locale_text: {n}You see Abelard's expression change, as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."
{n}You see Abelard's expression change, as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."
{n}You see Abelard's expression change as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."
{n}You see Abelard's expression change as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."
{n}You see Abelard's expression change as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的表情发生了变化，仿佛沉重的阴影突然压在他身上一样。他疲惫地揉着太阳穴。{/n}“就好像我们面对的麻烦还不够多似的……”
languages.original_text: {n}You see Abelard's expression change as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的表情发生了变化，仿佛沉重的阴影突然压在他身上一样。他疲惫地揉着太阳穴。{/n}“就好像我们面对的麻烦还不够多似的……”

languages.text: {n}L'expression d'Abélard change, comme si une ombre venait soudainement de s'abattre sur ses épaules. L'air las, il se frotte les tempes.{/n} « Comme si nous n'avions déjà pas de soucis comme ça... »
languages.original_text: {n}You see Abelard's expression change as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression d'Abélard change, comme si une ombre venait soudainement de s'abattre sur ses épaules. L'air las, il se frotte les tempes.{/n} « Comme si nous n'avions déjà pas de soucis comme ça... »

languages.text: {n}Ves que el rostro de Abelard se ensombrece. Cansado, se frota la sien.{/n} «Como si no tuviéramos ya más que suficientes problemas...».
languages.original_text: {n}You see Abelard's expression change as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves que el rostro de Abelard se ensombrece. Cansado, se frota la sien.{/n} «Como si no tuviéramos ya más que suficientes problemas...».

languages.text: {n}突然影が落ちたかのように、アベラルドの表情が変わった。彼はだるそうに、こめかみをこすった。{/n}「既にこんなにも問題を抱えているというのに…」
languages.original_text: {n}You see Abelard's expression change as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然影が落ちたかのように、アベラルドの表情が変わった。彼はだるそうに、こめかみをこすった。{/n}「既にこんなにも問題を抱えているというのに…」
{n}突然影が落ちたかのように、アベラルドの表情が変わった。彼はだるそうに、こめかみをこすった。{/n}「既にこんなにも問題を抱えているというのに…」

languages.text: {n}Du siehst, wie Abelards Miene sich ändert, als habe sich plötzlich ein Schatten auf ihn gelegt. Er reibt sich erschöpft die Schläfe.{/n} "Als hätten wir nicht schon genug Sorgen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}You see Abelard's expression change as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst, wie Abelards Miene sich ändert, als habe sich plötzlich ein Schatten auf ihn gelegt. Er reibt sich erschöpft die Schläfe.{/n} "Als hätten wir nicht schon genug Sorgen ..."

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın yüzündeki ifade, üzerine bir gölge düşmüş gibi bir anda değişiyor. Bitkince şakaklarını ovuşturuyor.{/n} "Başımızda yeterince dert yokmuş gibi..."
languages.original_text: {n}You see Abelard's expression change as if a shadow has suddenly fallen over him. He rubs his temple wearily.{/n} "As if we did not have enough troubles on our hands already..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard'ın yüzündeki ifade, üzerine bir gölge düşmüş gibi anında değişiyor. Bitkince şakaklarını ovuyor.{/n} "Elimizde yeterince sorun yokmuş gibi..."
